mapper.sql: id, send_object, type, title, author, pudate, enclosure, remarker_id, remarker_name, status, operator, operate_time, operate_ip
mapper.insert: insert into sys_notice (id, send_object, type, title, author, pudate, enclosure, remarker_id, remarker_name, status, operator, operate_time, operate_ip, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pudate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarkerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarkerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_notice ORDER BY id DESC limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_notice SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM sys_notice WHERE send_object LIKE CONCAT('%',"",'%')
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysNoticeSearchParam.title},'%')
AND type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysNoticeSearchParam.type},'%')
ORDER BY id DESC
